item.title: Useful Math Functions & Numbers
item.description: [[notes/WaveExpressions |Wave Expressions]] Golden Ratio Ratio between two numbers that equals approximately: 1.618 $\frac{a+b}{a}=\frac{a}{b}$ Golden Angle $\phi= 137.5 \degree$ - very useful when creating organic flowery stuff.

item.title: VEX Snippets
item.description: Wrangle Cheat Sheet I try my best to credit and link to any sources. That being said, some of those are pretty old and I have no idea where they came from.

item.title: Wave Expressions
item.description: Useful Periodic Functions I recently stumbled across this phenomenal summary of wave expressions by Cameron Carson. Check it out! He wrote everything for Nuke so I decided to build a similar little library for VEX and adjust the necessary syntax / functions.
